verses.verse: The Lord<WH3068> also spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH1696> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> to them, 'When<WH3588> any<WH376> man<WH376> has<WH1961> a discharge<WH2100> from his body,<WH1320> his discharge<WH2101> is unclean.<WH2931>

'This,<WH2088> moreover, shall be his uncleanness<WH2932> in his discharge:<WH2101> it is his uncleanness<WH2932> whether his body<WH1320> allows its discharge<WH2101> to flow,<WH7388> or<WH176> whether his body<WH1320> obstructs<WH2856> its discharge.<WH2101>

'Every<WH3605> bed<WH4904> on which<WH834> the person<WH376> with the discharge<WH2100> lies<WH7901> becomes<WH2930> unclean,<WH2930> and everything<WH3605> <WH3627> on which<WH834> he sits<WH3427> becomes<WH2930> unclean.<WH2930>
'Anyone,<WH376> moreover, who<WH834> touches<WH5060> his bed<WH4904> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening;<WH6153>

and whoever sits<WH3427> on the thing<WH3627> on which<WH834> the man with the discharge<WH2100> has been sitting,<WH3427> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'Also whoever touches<WH5060> the person<WH1320> with the discharge<WH2100> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'Or if<WH3588> the man with the discharge<WH2100> spits<WH7556> on one who<WH2889> is clean,<WH2889> he too shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>
'And every<WH3605> saddle<WH4817> on which<WH834> the person with the discharge<WH2100> rides<WH7392> becomes<WH2930> unclean.<WH2930>

'Whoever<WH3605> then touches<WH5060> any<WH3605> of the things which<WH834> were under<WH8478> him shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening,<WH6153> and he who carries<WH5375> them shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'Likewise, whomever<WH3605> <WH834> the one with the discharge<WH2100> touches<WH5060> without<WH3808> having rinsed<WH7857> his hands<WH3027> in water<WH4325> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'However, an earthenware<WH2789> vessel<WH3627> which<WH834> the person with the discharge<WH2100> touches<WH5060> shall be broken,<WH7665> and every<WH3605> wooden<WH6086> vessel<WH3627> shall be rinsed<WH7857> in water.<WH4325>

'Now when<WH3588> the man with the discharge<WH2100> becomes<WH2891> cleansed<WH2891> from his discharge,<WH2101> then he shall count<WH5608> off for himself seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> for his cleansing;<WH2893> he shall then wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> his body<WH1320> in running<WH2416> water<WH4325> and shall become<WH2891> clean.<WH2891>

'Then on the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> he shall take<WH3947> for himself two<WH8147> turtledoves<WH8449> or<WH176> two<WH8147> young<WH1121> pigeons,<WH3123> and come<WH935> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> to the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and give<WH5414> them to the priest;<WH3548>

and the priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6213> them, one<WH259> for a sin<WH9128> offering,<WH9128> and the other<WH259> for a burnt<WH5930> offering.<WH5930> So the priest<WH3548> shall make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> on his behalf<WH5921> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> because<WH4480> of his discharge.<WH2101>
'Now if<WH3588> a man<WH376> has<WH3318> a seminal<WH2233> emission,<WH7902> he shall bathe<WH7364> all<WH3605> his body<WH1320> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'As for any<WH3605> garment<WH899> or any<WH3605> leather<WH5785> on which<WH834> there is seminal<WH2233> emission,<WH7902> it shall be washed<WH3526> with water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'If a man<WH376> lies<WH7901> with a woman<WH802> [so that] there is a seminal<WH2233> emission,<WH7902> they shall both bathe<WH7364> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'When<WH3588> a woman<WH802> has<WH1961> a discharge,<WH2100> [if] her discharge<WH2101> in her body<WH1320> is blood,<WH1818> she shall continue<WH1961> in her menstrual<WH5079> impurity<WH5079> for seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> and whoever<WH3605> touches<WH5060> her shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'Everything<WH3605> also on which<WH834> she lies<WH7901> during her menstrual<WH5079> impurity<WH5079> shall be unclean,<WH2930> and everything<WH3605> on which<WH834> she sits<WH3427> shall be unclean.<WH2930>
'And anyone<WH3605> who touches<WH5060> her bed<WH4904> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'And whoever<WH3605> touches<WH5060> any<WH3605> thing<WH3627> on which<WH834> she sits<WH3427> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>
'Whether<WH518> it be on the bed<WH4904> or<WH176> on the thing<WH3627> on which<WH834> she is sitting,<WH3427> when he touches<WH5060> it, he shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'And if<WH518> a man<WH376> actually<WH7901> lies<WH7901> with her, so that her menstrual<WH5079> impurity<WH5079> is on him, he shall be unclean<WH2930> seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> and every<WH3605> bed<WH4904> on which<WH834> he lies<WH7901> shall be unclean.<WH2930>

'Now if<WH3588> a woman<WH802> has<WH2100> a discharge<WH2101> of her blood<WH1818> many<WH7227> days,<WH3117> not at the period<WH6256> of her menstrual<WH5079> impurity,<WH5079> or<WH176> if<WH3588> she has<WH2100> a discharge<WH2100> beyond<WH5921> that period,<WH5079> all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of her impure<WH2932> discharge<WH2101> she shall continue<WH1961> as though in her menstrual<WH5079> impurity;<WH5079> she is unclean.<WH2931>

'Any<WH3605> bed<WH4904> on which<WH834> she lies<WH7901> all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of her discharge<WH2101> shall be to her like her bed<WH4904> at menstruation;<WH5079> and every<WH3605> thing<WH3627> on which<WH834> she sits<WH3427> shall be unclean,<WH2931> like her uncleanness<WH2932> at that time.<WH5079>

'Likewise, whoever<WH3605> touches<WH5060> them shall be unclean<WH2930> and shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> in water<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>
'When<WH518> she becomes<WH2891> clean<WH2891> from her discharge,<WH2101> she shall count<WH5608> off for herself seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> and afterward<WH310> she shall be clean.<WH2891>

'Then on the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> she shall take<WH3947> for herself two<WH8147> turtledoves<WH8449> or<WH176> two<WH8147> young<WH1121> pigeons,<WH3123> and bring<WH935> them in to the priest,<WH3548> to the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting.<WH4150>

'And the priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6213> the one<WH259> for a sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> and the other<WH259> for a burnt<WH5930> offering.<WH5930> So the priest<WH3548> shall make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> on her behalf<WH5921> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> because<WH4480> of her impure<WH2932> discharge.<WH2101>'

"Thus you shall keep<WH5144> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> separated<WH5144> from their uncleanness,<WH2932> lest<WH3808> they die<WH4191> in their uncleanness<WH2932> by their defiling<WH2930> My tabernacle<WH4908> that is among<WH8432> them."
This<WH2088> is the law<WH8451> for the one with a discharge,<WH2100> and for the man who<WH834> has<WH3318> a seminal<WH2233> emission<WH7902> so that he is unclean<WH2930> by it,

and for the woman<WH1739> who<WH1739> is ill<WH1739> because of menstrual<WH5079> impurity,<WH5079> and for the one who has a discharge,<WH2101> whether a male<WH2145> or a female,<WH5347> or a man<WH376> who<WH834> lies<WH7901> with an unclean<WH2931> woman.<WH2931>
